backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing access‑controlled PDF storage, user profiles, Dropbox token admin management, and sorted PDF retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented checklist additions, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in the checklist app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, identity checks, profile setup flow, and initialization handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI card shown when a user lacks access, with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users for their name and submitting profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Route guard that checks admin status and displays loading or access‑denied states.
frontend/src/components/checklist/Checkl: Layout wrapper for checklist sections with title, description, and content area.
frontend/src/components/checklist/YesNoF: Reusable yes/no radio input component for checklist items.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing year, app branding, and a link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the app header with navigation, login/logout handling, and admin access controls based on identity and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/system/InitError: Displays an application initialization error with details and optional retry action.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, roles, admin privileges, and Dropbox token operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/checklist/defaults.ts: Provides a function that returns default checklist form data values.
frontend/src/lib/checklist/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for the structure of checklist form data.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/downloadPdf.ts: Generates a PDF blob and triggers a browser download for given bytes and filename.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/filename.ts: Sanitizes a room number into a safe PDF filename.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/generateChecklistPd: Builds a simple text-based PDF from checklist form data and returns it as a Uint8Array.
frontend/src/lib/upload/uploadChecklistP: Uploads a generated PDF to Dropbox via the files/upload API using a provided access token.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSettingsPage.tsx: Provides an admin UI to view, enter, and save a Dropbox access token with validation and status feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ChecklistFormPage.tsx: Renders the inspection checklist form, generates and downloads a PDF, and optionally uploads it to Dropbox.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive data from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme customization, plugins, and design tokens for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and tracked feature requests for the Safety Inspection app.
